title: Bug 6410 - File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Description: When using code assist, the file remains unchanged but is marked as dirty.
OB: When code assist has nothing to suggest, the file is still marked as dirty.
EB: If code assist has nothing to suggest, the file should not be marked as dirty.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the file in the IDE.
2. Invoke code assist with no suggestions available.
3. Check the file's status to see if it is marked as dirty when it should not be.
